comment:
* An action that can be taken to resolve a given issue. * *

When a user initiates an {@link Action}, that action's associated {@link PendingIntent} * will be executed, and the {@code successMessage} will be displayed if present.

methods.name: public String getId()
methods.comment: Returns the ID of this action.

methods.name: public CharSequence getLabel()
methods.comment: Returns a label describing this {@link Action}.

methods.name: public PendingIntent getPendingIntent()
methods.comment: Returns the {@link PendingIntent} to execute when this {@link Action} is taken.

methods.name: public boolean willResolve()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether invoking this action will fix or address the issue sufficiently for it to
         * be considered resolved (i.e. the issue will no longer need to be conveyed to the user in
         * the UI).

methods.name: public boolean isInFlight()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether this action is currently being executed (i.e. the user clicked on a
         * button that triggered this action, and now the Safety Center is waiting for the action's
         * result).

methods.name: public CharSequence getSuccessMessage()
methods.comment:
* Returns the success message to display after successfully completing this {@link Action}
         * or {@code null} if none should be displayed.

methods.name: public ConfirmationDialogDetails getConfirmationDialogDetails()
methods.comment:
* Returns the optional data to be displayed in the confirmation dialog prior to launching
         * the {@link PendingIntent} when the action is clicked on.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
